solution_line_template: He got that discount for {total_appointments}-{first_appointment}=<<{total_appointments}-{first_appointment}={discounted_appointments}>>{discounted_appointments} visits
So each of those visits cost {vet_appointment_cost}-{discount_per_visit}=$<<{vet_appointment_cost}-{discount_per_visit}={cost_per_discounted_visit}>>{cost_per_discounted_visit}

So he paid {discounted_appointments}*{cost_per_discounted_visit}=$<<{discounted_appointments}*{cost_per_discounted_visit}={total_discounted_visits_cost}>>{total_discounted_visits_cost} for those visits

That means he paid a total of {vet_appointment_cost}+{total_discounted_visits_cost}+{insurance_cost}=$<<{vet_appointment_cost}+{total_discounted_visits_cost}+{insurance_cost}={total_paid}>>{total_paid}
